Stages.Title: First Trimester
Stages.Description: Weeks 1-13. The baby's body structure forms.

Stages.Title: Second Trimester
Stages.Description: Weeks 14-26. Rapid growth and movement felt.

Stages.Title: Post-Term
Stages.Description: Overdue. The baby is arriving any moment!
